parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: The domain name that is used to match custom domain names. For example, if you set domainName to `example.com`, the matched domain names are `a.example.com` and `b.example.com`.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The line from which the query starts. Default value: 0.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 500. Maximum value: 500.
